description:
Well done, you've just found FlirtMaps, the first mobile dating app that makes it easy to break the ice with nearby singles in realtime. Whether you're at home or traveling the world, you can navigate the easy-to-use map to try your best opening line with other available members in your area.     

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH FLIRTMAPS: 
* Have fun flirting safely and securely with the hottest nearby singles
* See how close you are to your flirting partners on the map
* Chat in real-time with new people using the popular geo-chat
* Get push notifications as soon as someone is nearby or checks out your profile
* Use the FlirtBomb to send a single message to 50-200 people in one go 
* Track people that you're interested in using the radar feature
* Become a FlirtStar and rise to the top of search results 
* Make a lasting impression with gorgeous virtual gifts 

The use of FlirtMaps is completely free but you must be 18 or older in order to join FlirtMaps. Note that real time notifications and unlimited messaging are available for free only to women seeking men and for purchasers of a FlirtPass subscription. 

The FlirtPass subscriptions are: 
* 1 week (plus 500 FlirtCoins) $ 3.99 
* 1 month (plus 1,000 FlirtCoins) $ 9.99 
* 6 months (plus 5,000 FlirtCoins) $ 29.99 

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's settings.

After you grant authorization, the use of FlirtMaps on your mobile device causes your profile icon to appear on our maps in the approximate position of your mobile registration, with an accuracy of 1.2 mile (2 kilometers), so that nearby members can find you more easily. Your exact position is never revealed. 

Privacy Statement: http://www.flirtmaps.com/usage/privacypolicy
Terms & Conditions: http://www.flirtmaps.com/usage/termsandconditions

We love to hear from you - about the good, the bad and the funny things that happen to you: info@flirtmaps.com

Happy flirting,
The FlirtMaps crew
